content: Not worth the money for the simple tracking i need

Congratulations on a well designed and carefully planned app that works. I love the options, ease of use and overall reliability. Options for bird photos, egg colours, family trees and the added descriptions of each breed. All these make this app well worth paying for. I would add, if possible, a group or pen option for those of us who separate our birds for breeding purposes into different groups or pens. Thank you for such a totally useful app.

Love this app! Its exactly what I've been looking for to keep track of chicken related expenses and income. I think it would be awesome if they would add in an incubator feature as well. You could have things like eggs set, eggs hatched, chicks sold.
I love this app. I would give this five stars if when looking at my flock I could see the age as well as the hatch and egg dates I hate doing the math in my head lol.
Pretty good, but the graph doesn't go to zero for the days not recorded.
Too simplistic for a hatching operation. Might only be usefully if you just sell eating eggs.
replyContent: We're sorry you are bummed about that, that's not really what this app was designed for; but thanks for checking us out anyway!

content: I liked this app on my old phone, but it doesn't work on my new phone. Update: it's working just fine, now.
replyContent:
Hi,
What is the model and Android version of your phone? If you can provide that information at wbustraan@gmail.com we may be able to help you.
Thanks.

content: Great app for keeping track of my flock and finances! Love that it does the math for me.  New update I can change which bird gave eggs (species) but now I can't change egg color at all.  Edit: Went to put in purchased birds on Finances tab, and it won't let me select any of my turkeys, just chickens. Figured I should let you know. Still love this app, and I have tried several poultry apps!
replyContent: Sorry about that Courtney! I discovered that, on smaller screens, the area that contains the egg count number was overlapping the egg color, making it almost impossible to tap the color button unless you got just the right spot. Version 1.1.1 is now available and should fix the issue.

content: As my daughter was finishing up her 2018 4H record book, i was looking for an app to make it easier next year. This is great! As someone else said, it would be great to be able log how many chicks hatch from a brood as this is something we must track in a poultry project. I will be adding a 2nd flock in the Spring, broilers, is there a way to add a 2nd flock since it will be a seperate project?

Seriously this is the best poultry finance and flock tracking app. Also, if you ever experience a technical issue and email the developer, they actually respond and try to help you remedy the issue! I am beyond satisfied and know that my issue will be resolved shortly. I can't give 500 stars, or I would.

I never pay for apps, but I have no regrets about buying this one. I am a new chicken owner, and this app seemed the best fit. I often joke that logging my eggs in the app is the funnest part about getting eggs. I just wish I could view a graph that shows # of eggs by hen over time so I can see who is my best layer, who is more effected by seasonal changes, and who has peaked in productivity.

Just downloaded it and am checking it out on a recommendation from another 
user through BackYardChickins. So far looks like what I was looking for.

Awesome App. Absolutely love it. Helps me keep track of sales, feed, 
purchases, the flock, etc. I have emailed creator with suggestions on how 
to improve and he did it and then some. Essential for maintaining my flock. 
Highly reccomend. Also love th as g I can keep track of each egg color and 
my different breeds of birds like my ducks.

Will this do more than 1 flock? I have 5 very small breed flocks and i cant 
figure out how to seperate, they have different food and supplies. Thanks 
again ( 37 chickens & chicks)

I only wish that it gave an option for when you input your egg harvest that 
there was a way to track bad eggs, like if they were cracked or something 
else happened to them. It would be nice to have e a real count not just a 
count on good eggs.
replyContent: Hi Joe! Thanks for the review. Actually that is on the list for future features, so he'll add it when he can! ðŸ˜Š

content:
This is a great app for us back yard flock owners to keep track of how many 
eggs we collect daily. How much feed purchased & how much the total cost/ 
or lost. I would really like if there was a speckled egg choice.
replyContent: Hi! That's an interesting suggestion; it poses a bit of a challenge since he creates the colors using a system that is designed for solid color options, but I imagine you're not alone in the interest. We'll see what we can do! ðŸ˜Š

content:
I loved the app until I just got a new phone and it didnt sync up my info. 
Did I just lose all of my work?
replyContent: Since Android 7.0 (Marshmallow), Google provides a built-in facility to back up and restore app data. Mother Hen does not currently provide any additional sync mechanisms beyond this, but I am working hard to add active synchronization in the next release. Feel free to contact me at wbustraan@gmail.com. I would like to help you more if I can.

content: App seems very functional. But I had to request refund due to no backup or sync function. I've lost years of work before due to a device going bad
replyContent: Hello Antoinette, it is my understanding that Android has provided built-in backup for app data since Android 6.0. Does this not work on your device?

content: Like the app so far but for entering all the info pertaining to finances, it doesnt give you categry totals...Id like to be able to click on just "Feed" or just "shelter" and see how much each specific category has cost me. For example, how much it cost me to build my coop and run. Not just my entire expense total. Especially since this is a paid app.
Overall I like the app unfortunately they don't cover enough breeds I can't add my swedish flower hens to my flock :S
replyContent: Hello Breane, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. When you are viewing the list of breeds, there is a "+" button in the upper right corner that will allow you to add a new breed and name it whatever you would like, even if you make one up yourself.

content: Sorry couldn't find how to reply. A section for how many chicks you have hatched during the year would be awesome! I can't seem to find the sales part that says "bird" thank you for the fast reply!!
replyContent:
Thanks for the review! Did you get a chance to find the Sales area? Are you thinking you would like it listed separately than "Bird" in the Sale Type, in the Finances tab?
***
I've been trying to figure out how to send you a screenshot of where it is. If you send an email to wbustraan@gmail.com we can get you those images to help explain it. ðŸ™‚
